statement: My work is composed of wheel thrown & handbuilt porcelain forms, screenprinted with hand drawn illustrations with underglaze. Fired to cone 6, some are fired for a third time with gold/silver decals.
I am a full-time potter. Using the potters wheel & handbuilding techniques, I make mostly functional pottery. My work is decorated with imagery & texture using a variety of firing methods.

Mind Body Clay features all handcrafted fine art ceramic pottery and unique home decor pieces. All ceramic work is made from stoneware & porcelain, hand formed, glazed & draws inspiration from nature.

I handbuild my sculptures from earthenware clay. Textures are created using a variety of texture tools, some I have made myself, others are purchased rubber stamps. The pieces are bisque fired and fin
Ceramics: Black and white functional and sculptural ceramics. Each piece has a unique hand carved image. In addition we offer colorful ceramic jewelry.
Stoneware clay was thrown on the wheel, original decorations and patterns created, and firing was done using traditional kiln techniques (including raku and wood fire).
All original functional and decorative pottery. Thrown and handbuilt stoneware vessels and sculpture. Electric fired to cone 6 and also naked raku firing technique.

I value the quirks that make people special, and follow the same approach in my design. Rather than striving for exact replications, I use techniques that allow the clays personality to shine through.
I create bold and fun tableware that is wheel thrown and hand decorated with a focus on design, color, narrative.
Wheel thrown and handbuilt functional pottery. My work is inspired by texture, pattern, and nature to create beautiful works of art for use in every day life.
I make unique one of a kind handmade pottery pieces that are mostly wheel thrown, trimmed, glazed and fired in electric kiln for completion. All my pieces are my original design and user friendly.
We throw the works on a traditional wheel and shape all of our pieces by hand. We formulate our own glazes. Despite these traditions, our work will stand the challenge of use in microwave ovens, tra
I am a native Atlantian who lives in Candler Park. I make small batch functional ceramic goods such as mugs, bowls, serving pieces, to-go coffee cups, vases. I have a clean modern aesthetic.
Artisan Gourmet Goat Milk Soaps, Lotions, Scrubs, Bath Bombs, Bath Bomb Cupcakes, Cupcake Soaps &more! We've done the show 3 years now & love attending and Vending
Uncorked Candles creates amazingly aromatic candles hand poured into recycled, repurposed beer, wine and liquor bottle containers.
Thyme to Garnish creates hand-blended, naturally dehydrated vegetables, herbs, spices, nuts and seeds into mixes that can be added to pantry and/or refrigerator items to enhance everyday foods.
We hand-pour each of our candles in batches of 12 in our studio in Atlanta. All of our candles are made using American grown soy wax, all natural cotton wicks & fine fragrance oils.
Using a 4-step, cold-working process, we upcycle beer and wine bottles into soy candles, planters and serving dishes. Our soy candles, wax melts, and room sprays are made with 100% organic fragrance.
Cheeky Maiden Soap produces hand crafted all natural soap, body care products and household cleaning supplies using local, organic and sustainable raw materials.

We have a packaged raw honey infused with fruits, vegetables, and spices. I'm pretty sure that you may already have a honey vendor, but please keep in mind that this is not your ordinary infused honey

business: Smack Yo Mama Gourmet BBQ Sauce
statement: We produce 7 gluten, high-fructose corn syrup and MSG free bbq sauces by combining ingredients in a steam kettle then bottling. we also have a salt free all purpose dry seasoning we combine by hand.
Our plant-based, cruelty free, luxury self care products handcrafted with premium ingredients include soaps, herb infused moisturizers, bath bombs and soaks, candles, room & linen sprays and more!
True & Radiant is a handmade line of all natural and organic skincare and hair care products made with the finest natural and organic cosmetic ingredients. I make everything by hand in small batches.
Honey Vinegars, Whipped & Infused Honeys, Honey Butters, Honey Mustards & Raw Honeys     Winner & Finalist Awards: sofi Gold, Good Food Guild Finalist, Flavor of Georgia, Intl Flaves
We sell Old Fashioned Licorice. Red, black, cinnamon and chocolate.
I create a unique candle that doubles as a warm moisturizer,combining the highest quality ingredients including,shea butter,coconut oil,rose hip oil,grape seed oil,Vitamin E and cosmetic grade soy.
We make 100% soy candles and melts. Warmers, incense and oils.
Original blends of Rub/Seasonings. Hand blended and bottled in Roswell, GA.   7 different blends. Members of Georgia Grown Dept of Ag
We raise goats on our farm in western Kentucky, milk them and make soap. Our soaps smell wonderful, look beautiful and make you feel fantastic.  We also make solid lotion bars, lip balm, and more.
Georgia Grown  Georgia Made Gourmet Foods Jams Jellies Pickled Vegetables Vidalia Onion Barbeque Sauces Fruit Chutneys Gormet Sauces
We are known for our 60% Olive Oil Artisan soaps using the Cold Process method, large bath bombs, and seasonal candles.
Packaged food- Organic granola, energy bars and bites, nuts
We make bean-to-bar dark chocolate made from cacao beans we import directly from South and Central America and East Africa and turn them into dark chocolate bars at the Krog Street Market.
Bare candles are hand poured in small batches by the owner with tree-free stone label to limit the impact. Using only 100% soy wax and phthalate-free fragrances, Bare candles are clean and simple.
Soy candles, cold processed soap and body products made with raw materials sourced from Georgia farmers and packaged in compostable, biodegradable, and recyclable materials. Vegan and Cruelty free
Custom newborn and baby accessories including our signature diaper changing clutches, car seat canopies, bibs, and burp cloths, for the trendy mom and dapper dad.
Beautiful Briny Sea is an artisan dry goods company based in Atlanta, Georgia. Our small-batch salt blends, sugars, and seasonings are made with integrity, sustainability and a whole lot of love!
We keep over 160 beehives in Atlanta in 15 neighborhoods. We keep bees in Inman Park by N Highland and Cleburne. We will have Inman Park Honey, Beeswax Candles, and other hive products.
Phickles is a specialty food company based in Athens, Ga. Our products include small batch artisan pickled vegetables, bbq sauces and marinades, salsa, pepper jellies, and cheese spreads.
Local Raw Honey from our 3-generation family farm in Gainesville GA.
I design and screenprint Atlanta based designs honoring and recognizing Atlanta's wide variety of neighborhoods. Each design is uniquely colored with a resin finish to seal it.
I draw Custom Charcoal Pet Portraits from clients' photographs. All work is hand-drawn in charcoal and pastel, then mailed to the client in 1-2 weeks. I also offer printed items featuring my work.
I create illustrations using pencil, markers, and pen.
Live Caricature Art Entertainment
We create and screen print posters, textiles, cards and more from our shop located in East Point
I design and print clothing and accessories
I am a relief printmaker, I primarily use my hand-carved woodblocks to print T-shirts at festivals but I also sell original carvings and hand-pulled prints.
Fairtrade products- stuffed toys, purses, silk, linen scarves- handwoven on a backstrap loam, in Nepal, with 100% cotton, silk, linen yarns which are hand dyed with natural/ regular azo- free dye .
Abstract and atlanta based sketches pulled from my sketch book and digitized for screen printing. 2-3 color images screen printed onto tees, hats, and prints.

I make high quality Tie Dye Clothing and Accessories. Each piece is hand folded, bound and dyed individually.
We create cutting edge fashion accessories from upcycled,repurposed fabrics.Hand painted fabric,photography,humorous and inspirational messages are added to wallets and handbags for originality.
Handmade cushion in non-allergenic fabrics. We use plastic safety eyes. Our collection is based on marine animals with shapes that allow you to rest and relax. Ideal for Room Kids, and Nursery Decor.

business: Tinga Tinga Inter Inc DBA Ethnic Vibes
statement: Everything i sell is 100% handcrafted, We do bleach and dye technique on 100% rayon fabric .  African ethnic garment are hand tailored using the original Ankara fabric and all the bead-work is masai
I make handmade ATL hats for adults, kids and pets. I also offer fun local designs such as state shapes and OTP and ITP hats!
We make blankets, pillows, zippies, cuffs, hearts, bags, scarves & even shirts...from beautiful fabric that has been made from recycled saris. We adorn our products with hand-stamped positive quotes.

Handmade designer aprons, tea towels, oven mitts and other kitchen accessories
I hand crochet festival tops and I hand macrame plant hangers and wall hangings.
Linen clothing line
Printed tea towels and t-shirts with funny sayings. Graphics and printing is all done by me.
Handcrafted fabric(upholstery) handbags. Original, unique, excellent quality.
Personally handcrafted bags, wallets, totes and small organizers created from cork, leather and textiles. Most pieces have added "bling" that has been up cycled from costume jewelry finds.
a patented seagrass hat that is one size fits all, pack-able and tested at 40 mph on a jetski.

I digitally design my own black and white coloring fabric prints, and sew each item myself including installing zippers, interfacing, stuffing, and hand stitching. All items are intended for coloring.
I have handmade/hand loomed Turkish towels and throws. Most are 100% cotton and some are 80% cotton and 20% bamboo.

Ana Ana has high quality Traditional Turkish Textiles made of Aegean Cotton and hand woven. We have turkish towels, shawls and blankets and some handcrafts from womenâ€™s market from coastal town Dikili

Cactus gardens and succulent Gardens grown and designed by Peggy. Using pea gravel lava rock, driftwood, seashells, and assorted mosses for decor
Plant Design & Delivery business. Every plant is truly one of a kind and thoughtfully designed. All pots/containers are either hand-made in house or made from re-purpose or recycled materials.
We plant colorful and unusual succulents and sansevierias in pots for indoors or outdoors, using a wide variety of containers, ranging from traditional to whimsical.
Stained glass art using mosiac and fusion techniques
Art glass is cut,assembled into a design,fused & annealed in a kiln;cooled & placed on top of a mold,returned to the kiln for forming.Slumped bottle clocks,spoon rests;bottle lamps,vases.

business: Antique Glass Wind Chimes & Bird Feeders
statement: Antique glass wind chimes. Vintage soda bottle hummingbird feeders. Vintage glass bird feeders. Vintage themed crystal suncatchers.  All made using no glue, bolted together. High quality crystals.
I hand make baby bibs and bodysuits using a combination of fabric appliquÃ©s and vinyl.
I use a propane and oxygen torch to melt, blow, pull and gather borosilicate glass into colorful works of art.
I make stained and fused glass sun catchers, window panels and ornaments. I use the Tiffany method to assemble my stained glass.   Some of my pieces I combine both stained and kiln worked glass.
I am a glass blower. The technique I use is referred to as lampwork. The type of glass I use is borosilicate.
3D beveled and stained glass objects including sun catchers, air plant planters and orbs. Utilizing the tiffany foil method, lead came and metal channel.
Handmade and hand stamped jewelry using copper, silver, brass, and semi-precious gemstones. I cut, saw, and solder the components used in my jewelry and I personalize on site for my customers.
A. Battiste is a handmade jewelry company based in Atlanta, GA. It is minority woman owned and operated. A variety of techniques are used including soldering, hammering, wrapping and connecting.

Baizaar features all handmade jewelry and one of a kind apparel made in partnership with empowered artisans in Thailand and India. All items are made in small production following Fair Trade practices
Simple, minimal, meaningful jewelry. Yoga/Nature Inspired. Handmade.
I design & fabricate jewelry using techniques to manipulate fine metals, enhanced with natural stones, pearls, & components. Skills include torch, stone setting, wrap, chain, metal forming & PMC.
I explore the medium of chainmaking, originally through an interest in armor. I now present my work by adapting historic styles into new patterns and concepts that preserve their traditional origin.
I work with ancient technique of CloisonnÃ© Enamel. I use traditional metalworking and fuse enamel on fine silver by combining it with sterling silver and precious stones.
I cut, solder/electroplate stone, coins, prisms and metals to create ensembles that can be worn multiple ways. Women get 1:1 styling where they can choose personal selections to complete their look.
I hand make jewelry by soldering found or created objects into pendants and by crocheting chains with beads for a feminine, bohemian look. The creative ranges from the delicate to the bold statement.
Beautiful stones, Beads and precious metals unite to form my handmade jewelry. I create my jewelry by twisting and bending sterling silver and other metals sometimes capturing semi-precious stones.

Contemporary sterling silver jewelry with a pop of color through the use of vibrant colored resins or semi precious stones.
Metal work in sterling silver,gold filed, stones necklaces and men/women leather work bracelets.
I utilize the techniques of fabrication, PMC sculpting, wire wrapping with gemstones and the Victorian lace making techniques of hand tatting and knotting to create unique mixed media jewelry.
cameoko jewelry is a playful and modern resin jewelry line that is creating using crushed gemstones and minerals combined with metallic flakes and set in cast open bezels.
I use 14k Gold Filled, Sterling Silver and Oxidized Sterling Silver materials for a dainty, yet slightly edgy, jewelry. I solder and hammer to make earrings, necklaces, rings & bracelets.
Handmade coin and silver jewelry. Unique jewelry. Sterling silver rings and chains.
Hand cut/ hammered/ soldered from a raw metal state. Customizations. Some set stones & painted accents. Mostly precious metals. Base metals/leather offered in our Boho concept I call "Guinnevere".
I create unique, sustainable, jewelry from reclaimed materials, gemstones, and found objects.
Jewelry and accessories created from salvaged vintage maps. (Returning vendor)
Benchmade sterling silver hand fabricated rings, necklaces, pendants, bracelets. Sterling silver with or without natural stone cabochons.
I create jewelry using natural gemstones, freshwater pearls, sterling silver, and 14 karat gold fill. Each piece is finished with hand-forged and hammered clasps, ear wires and metalwork.
I fabricate in sterling silver and gold. Using semi-precious stones in most pieces I strive to make each one, from earrings to rings and pendants, unique and individual.
Hand forged pieces incorporating 14k gold fill chain and gemstones.  Modern, affordable, and asymmetrical necklaces, earrings, and bracelets.
Traditional metalsmithing techniques and hand tools are used to hand fabricate one of a kind jewelry pieces. Materials used are natural cabochons, sterling silver, and some gold.
Artist-made lampwork glass beads made using soda-lime glass, frit, enamels & studio blown glass shards. The beads are integrated into jewelry with Swarovski crystals, gemstones and sterling findings.
personally handcrafted silver and gold rings. we cast, forge, solder, twist, and hammer to create a variety of styles in solid .925 sterling silver and 14KY gold fill. Rings for all sizes!
All jewelry is hand fabricated in sterling silver or 14k gold filled and genuine gemstones to achieve a synthesis of bold clean lines and striking relationships of form and color.
Sterling silver, semi-precious stones, and found objects joined together in art. Created with instinct as much as design gives each piece a sense of nature and spirituality with an ancient feel.
Handmade in Candler Park, Crafts & Love highlights natural, raw gemstones with minimalist geometric brass lines to create affordable handcrafted jewelry using wire-wrapping and beading skills.

From the silversmiths of the ancient Hill Tribe villages in Southeast Asia, to the traditional weavers of Mayan Ponchos in Guatemala, we travel to remote parts of the world collecting handmade crafts.

Handmade cowhide purses, coin purses, wristbands, barrettes, gifts for children(leather), made with advanced techniques, nylon thread, YKK Zippers.
I am third generation in the art of making leather. I design my own patterns. That I hand cut out of cowhide leather. Then I sew the purse together.
All designs are hand cut, bonded and/or stitched using recycled leather.
Each pair of shoes and bag is hand-tooled and handcarved, hand painted to give unique 3D effects and patina to the hand-work.

A unique combination of wood & other natural elements that gives the illusion of naturally joined branches.

My art is hand designed made out of paper. I do Butterflies pictures, singles,flowers, dragonflies it's all very uniqus.
Original photography printed using an archival ink bonding process (calibrated for each individual piece), wed with the gestural connotations of acrylic paint and varnish on hand-built wood panel.

Textured layers of latex and acrylic paint on masonite board. The texture of the working surface consists of sand applied using a bonding technique. Multiple layers of thin washes, water and alcohol.
Each work incorporates a watercolor wash, a variety of different papers, and oil paint on wood. All paintings are influenced by nature and double imagery is used in the larger pieces.

Glass on painted convas under resin in a variety of techniques.

I paint heavily textured portraits of iconic figures, animals, cityscapes and landscapes on canvas. I also draw digital portraits of animals, which are then transferred to wood and hand cut.
Combining grey washes in the back ground with colorful dry brushed images in the foreground I achieve a vibrant, fun and whimsical compositions. Acrylic paint on canvas allows me the avenue.
ATL based artist with a focus on whimsical animal portraits and bird paintings. Every animal has a name + story. Originals are Acrylic on canvas + digitized prints.
Acrylic paintings and related merchandise, depicting pop iconography, pop culture, monsters and hot rod/kustom kulture related imagery
I paint Modern Realistic Acrylic Paintings.  I blend my acrylics with retarder to reduce the drying time and add time to blend. This makes some of my paintings look like Oil paintings.
Paintings, print making and illustration made with acrylic paint, spray paint, ink and resin.
I paint in acrylics on canvas. I paint pet and people portraits.  I take orders at the event and then deliver paintings later. I will have some items for sale at the event as well.

Low-brow and pop art pieces with acrylic paints on canvas. Inspiration comes from comic books, tattoos, sci-fi, and pop culture. Original paintings, signed/ numbered prints, and magnets are available.

I do professional, amazing face painting
I paint abstract landscapes using acrylic paint and sell the originals and reproductions.
My art is lyrical and mystical, and it possesses a universal appeal express through oil paintings. Abstract style in a subjective manner.
Oil on canvas using brushes & palette knives to obtain texture & vibrant colors. Artwork is inspirational & joyful in concept, depicting vivid scenes of harmonious interaction with the natural world.

Oil on canvas depicting abstract landscape designs based on significant moments or meaningful locations

Painting on recycled materials etc. Folk art

All natural dog biscuits and treats.

business: artworks by susan, photography textile artist
statement: I print my photographs on fabric, stretched on 1.5" gallery wrap, varnished with painted edges.
Fine art photography. Subject matter varied, but predominantly focused on the Inman Park Neighborhood. Selling loose prints as well as framed prints in a variety of sizes.

Original Juggling batons, patented bouncing flying soft and safe frisbees, Seed bead art, children's beaded items. Bottle cap art. Been apart of this festival for 10+ years. Love it.

Our products are bold, graphic inspired apparel and goods. Our mission is to create high quality, affordable goods, while giving back to the communities we work, live and play in.

Hammock.chairs. swings. Porch lounges. Frames. Hanging furniture.
beehive home (formerly Climb) is an affordable handmade line of pressed mugs, laser-cut jewelry & local maps, sublimated baby apparel, and housewares. Our line is tongue-in-cheek, to make you smile.
Eco friendly products made from recycled and sustainable materials. Bamboo, silk and organic cotton clothing, recycled tent totes, recycled rugs mad into pillows, silver plated recycled creations.

We run everything out of my basement in Kirkwood. All short sleeve button down shirts with fun animal prints. Prints drawn by us and our friends.
we will have clothing, accessories, and jewelry
High quality tees and hats with designs relating to Atlanta.
All of our ceramics and knobs are handmade and hand-painted unique pieces.
Hand Strung crystals attaching them to various objects such as horse shoes, watering cans, driftwood and other objects. Each catching the rays of the sun allowing them to cast beautiful rainbows.
Our Mandalina Eco Towels, Blankets, & Wraps are contemporary, light weight textiles for the beach boat and home. The perfect combination of both function and design
Hand Dyed Silk Scarves. Floral with a unique pattern implementing three processes: 1. Batik2. French Painting, 3. Italian Marbling. All silk scarves are set to be washer / dryer safe.
I make Hand Crafted Longboard Skateboards and Chairs out of Up Cycled Vintage Trick Water Skis.
A practice in patience is a combination of intricate work with paper, ceramics, and watercolor. I hand-cut paper with a scalpel and turn the designs into stencils for planters and textiles.
As cartographers, we use many map-making techniques to create unique pieces of the Atlanta area, other cities, and features of the natural world.
I work in watercolor and gouache and print my designs on a range of products including mugs, shirts, wood block prints, greeting cards and pins. I also sell my original artwork.
At Things UnCommon, we handcraft candles, body products, textiles and ceramics and are known for our southern-inspired whimsical names and designs.
Artist designed active wear made from recycled plastic water bottles. Textile patterns created from photographs taken by Barbara Northrup. Printed and sewn in small artisan batches in Georgia.
We create cute and whimsical designs that encourage customers to create their own story for each illustration. Each design is hand printed on our shirts as well as printed on heavy cover stock paper.
Homemade jams, jellies, relish, pickles and salsa. All made small batch by Jill herself. No mass production. All natural products. Licensed by the Ga. Department of Ag./Georgia Grown member.
Big Skinny Wallets in mens and womens styles
I provide premium/organic loose-leaf teas that I source directly from growers in different countries and/or blend as well as teaware. A woman-owned local business, tea represents purity and harmony.
The SandArt Cart creates SandArt with children of all ages. We teach design techniques and offer a hands on art activity that they get to talk home! Fun for the whole family. 28 vibrant colors!!
Odd Little Birdie creates quirky horror and pop culture inspired hand embroidery and mixed media art! Paper Bones is a whimsical, colorful world of watercolor creatures and adorable baby onesies!
I paint with acrylics on canvas or wood.I paint my characters with a flat, illustrative style, and use a bright, mostly pastel color scheme. My wife makes plush creatures based on my design.

I create fun pop art art illustrations. I use acrylic paint, pencils & ink on various surfaces. At my booth I sell original works as well as prints and merch based of my own original works.
